subject: Re: IS ANYONE HERE INTERESTED IN ANYTHING OTHER THAN  POSTING EVP`S HERE ?
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
And I suppose fro true communication we are supposed to go back the wet batteries and morse code because that was how it was done originally. 

 I care about getting the clearest possible communication, not focusing on what was done 50 years ago. 

 Go join AA-EVP-or whatevder their new name is if you want to be stuck inthe past--they claim EVP is only stuckonstatic crap. 

F-S


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ozestrangeufo" <ozestrangeufo@...> wrote:
>
> Hi
> Is there anyone here interested in anything to do with some of the
> science/history behind the EVP phenomena.?Or is this just a forum for
> posting evp`s and guessing what they said.Just a little confused..and I
> mean no offense..
> Mike
>
